dmca.title: iconsurf.com
dmca.body:
I'm sure you get enough hate mail regarding your iconsurf.com site links, so
I'll make this brief.

Since you are using my (copyrighted) icon on a site which solicits advertisment
income, you are violating the law.  I'm sure you don't intend to be sued, and I
understand it can be easy to make mistakes.  In the interest of being
forgiving, friendly, and helpful, I'll wait a week for you to stop using
copyrighted material on your site.  If after that time, you choose to continue
violating the law, I will need to take other actions including, but not limited
to, seeking legal action against you.

Sincerely,

Paul Ericksen

P.S.  Just to avoid your next, likely yet unexceptable response, let me
preemptively say that I've noticed on your site a statement assuring that
webmasters who didn't want their icons to be listed on your site could request
their image to be removed.  After you have used someone's copyrighted material
for you financial gain, the law has already been broken.  There would be no
need to ask for my icon's removal if you are not breaking the law.  Removing my
icon would not stop you from continuing the crime you commit with every hit on
your site.  Just stop posting any icon you don't have permission to use, and
you should be a-ok.
